CIPHER.0.cipherString: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,13).

CIPHER.2.cipherString: I don't always wear underwear. When I'm in the heat, especially, I can't wear it. Like, if I'm wearing a flower dress, why do I have to wear underwear?

CIPHER.3.cipherString: Any idea, plan, or purpose may be placed in the mind through repetition of thought.

CIPHER.4.cipherString: The Bible calls us to love our neighbors, and to do justice and love kindness, not to indiscriminately kill one another.

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Americans need to understand the significance of having their civil liberties dismantled. It doesn't just affect terrorists and foreigners, it affects us all.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,24).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: I have always been attracted to the cottage industry side of this business.
CIPHER.6.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,5).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: I give myself sometimes admirable advice, but I am incapable of taking it.
CIPHER.7.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,17).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value; but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better.
CIPHER.8.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,13).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: Think as a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.
CIPHER.9.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(21,9).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: I was an opportunist and got away with things because I was very young, but I went to prison and came out and remade my life.
CIPHER.10.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,24).

CIPHER.11.cipherString: I LOVE WINNERS WHEN THEY CRY, LOSERS WHEN THEY TRY.
